entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 13.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: SSW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
